name: Blockasset
description: Blockasset leverages strategic relationships with athletes, sports agencies, and sports clubs and connects them with fans on a one-stop athlete NFT platform. The platform will have four core components: A blockchain NFT (non-fungible-token) marketplace - this is the central hub of the Blockasset eco, a custom/white label athlete NFT marketplace facility for major sports brands and organisations, a community rewards and staking build into the platform, and an NFT gaming suite. Together the components create the intertwined Blockasset eco where fans and athletes have multiple touch points which support virtual and real-world engagement. The eco has a native utility token called BLOCK token, which has various functions including governance, NFT discounts, priority access, athlete content governance, staking and NFT farming.
